title: @Reav3 3 Champions so close together, what happened ?
body:
Yuumi hits live server and Morde gets teased around a week later.

Mordekaiser isn't even on live server yet that Qiyana is teased and will hit PBE as soon as Morde is live...

What happened ? It's easy to guess that Yuumi got delayed, but did Morde get delayed too and Qiyana just happened to be ready ?

It's pretty weird since the last times it happened (and got noticed) was with Aurelion Sol release and Gnar/Azir that were really close. Never got a trio !

{{sticker:sg-lulu}} I will gladly accept another mid laner in my ranks tho

replies.body: Generally we release more content during summer because we have much higher engagement during that time since it's summer vacation for a lot of our players.

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=kOXrM2AL,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-06-06T23:14:33.544+0000)
>
> Generally we release more content during summer because we have much higher engagement during that time since it's summer vacation for a lot of our players.

It doesn't kill off the hype or the popularity of the other champs too early ? I can swear it's been very long since you and the team decided to pull off something like that (Xayah/Rakan is an exception).

Is it a way to replace the conventionnal mid-season changes that usually serves this role ?
D-Does that mean Pantheon is coming out this summer as well? {{sticker:cass-cry}}
late july-early august is my bet
is it safe to say we can expect (little) more Lore releases as well? or just for gameplay parts of the game?

I personally feel that this way of doing things disrupts the game too much. 

People still haven't learnt how to play with / against Yuumi and you've already realeased 2 new other shiney stuff. 

From a macro business perspective, do players not care about what other disruption factors there are and just want to play with all the shiney stuff?
I think a rioter said Panth is going to be in the first half of this year. And we are in the last month of the first half...

> [{quoted}](name=Camille Ferrøs,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=kOXrM2AL,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-06-06T22:23:18.679+0000)
>
> I think a rioter said Panth is going to be in the first half of this year. And we are in the last month of the first half...

Only up to ''Assassin'' was confirmed for first half of the year.

Pantheon is second half.
Thank you for the information.  I may get another month with my main.

Yes.

Kayle & Morgana, Yuumi, Morde, Qianna were all part of the "First half"   https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J0X83lIeez4 as they hadn't announced Panth at the time, but it's already the middle of the year now being that it's June.  So Pantheon and the Marksmen are for the second half.
There there {{sticker:katarina-love}}   He will be seen soon enough, just like the long awaited Zilean skin, return of Project, Arcade and Star Guardians *waiting waiting waiting*

It was kind of pointed out in the dev original video diary that they had quite a few planned for the first half of the year.  

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J0X83lIeez4

Kayle & Morgana, Yuumi, Morde, Qianna.  It's june now, so yeah they are keeping up to what they said.
